title: Sound On: Financial Regulation, Athlete Compensation
itunes:title: Sound On: Financial Regulation, Athlete Compensation
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Bloomberg White House reporter Josh Wingrove, Brian Morgenstern, former White House Deputy Press Secretary and Deputy Assistant Secretary of the Treasury, Sports Agent Eric Mitchell, Co-Founder & Head of CEO at Lifeflip Media, and Bill McGinley, Principal at The Vogel Group.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
